Text.Page:
You seem to be very popular, . The camp west of Pora Elinu needs a capable soldier and they've asked for you by name.

Would you go and help them? Speak with {@LinkCreature:223#1010$$Lohona} at the Valkyon Federation camp.

You're ? Not what I expected. From the tales surrounding you. I thought you'd be as tall as a dracoloth.

Well, let's put you to work and see if the stories hold up.
